channel.title: Making A Item Require Pkp To Wear. 317 [PI]
channel.description: Does anyone know how to make an item require pkp to wear it? like if you try to wear Vesta you will need 50 pkp to wear it. No buy it but wear it. so they can have 50k sets of vesta in their bank and wont be able to wear it unless they have 50 pkp.

item.title: Making A Item Require Pkp To Wear. 317 [PI]
item.dc:creator: @cmcmvj cmcmvj
item.description:
@cmcmvj wrote:

The code would be something like this:
don’t have any pi base to get the codes cba downloading one, but this isn’t hard to do if you have any questions or errors post them here i’ll(or other people) will help you

if(targetSlot == itemslot) {
if(c.vestitemreq <49) {
sendMessage(“you need “+vesteskirtpoints+” to wear this item.”);
wearitem = false;
}
}

Read full topic
item.source: Making A Item Require Pkp To Wear. 317 [PI]

item.title: Making A Item Require Pkp To Wear. 317 [PI]
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Well, I’m not exactly sure how to do this on a PI source, but however it would probably be better if you created a whole nother point system if you plan to do this, unless, of course you don’t plan to sell things with PKP.
